description:
Bulma suggests summoning Shenron to find the remaining Super Dragon Balls, but even his power is not enough. As they prepare for the upcoming match, Beerus reveals there’s a fighter stronger than Goku who’s going to join the team of the 7th Universe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakutou Shiai Kaisai Kettei! Shushou wa Gokuu yori mo Tsuyoi Yatsu
Kampfkunstturnier ist beschlossen! – Der Team-Captain ist stärker als Goku?
The Martial Arts Match Has Been Decided! The Team Captain Is Stronger Than Goku
格闘試合開催決定! 主将は悟空よりも強いヤツ
